author: bzuu
body:
Adding the `-Exclude` parameter to `Get-ChildItem` seems to implicitly set the `-FollowSymlink` flag. So it is possible that a call *with* `-Exclude` returns more items than when the items are not excluded, which is incredibly confusing.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
# Run the following with elevated permissions otherwise creating a symbolic link is not allowed

# Create ExampleOutput directory to contain the example files
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Name ExampleOutput

# Create a directory to link to with some content
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Name SomeDirToLinkTo -Path ExampleOutput
New-Item -ItemType File -Name SomeFileInLinkedDir -Path  ExampleOutput\SomeDirToLinkTo

# Create a directory with content as well as a symbolic link to the other dircetory
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Name SomeDirWithLinkedContent -Path ExampleOutput
New-Item -ItemType File -Name SomeFileInNonLinkedDir -Path ExampleOutput\SomeDirWithLinkedContent
New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Name LinkToSomeDir -Value ExampleOutput\SomeDirToLinkTo -Path ExampleOutput\SomeDirWithLinkedContent

# Show different outputs (note: it doesn't matter what you exclude, so empty string here for brevity)
Write-Host "Number of items without exclude: " $(Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Path ExampleOutput).Length
Write-Host "Number of items with exclude: " $(Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Path ExampleOutput -Exclude "").Length
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
Number of items without exclude:  5
Number of items with exclude:  5
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
Number of items without exclude:  5
Number of items with exclude:  6
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.4
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.4
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.16299
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
